## Checklist

### Required
- [ ] I have run `npm run validate` and it passes
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally with `npm run build`
- [ ] My changes follow the existing code style
- [ ] All fields are complete (id, word, date, pronunciation, partOfSpeech, definition, example, etymology, synonyms)

### For Word Content
- [ ] The word is appropriate for a general audience
- [ ] The definition is clear and accurate
- [ ] The example sentence demonstrates proper usage
- [ ] Etymology information is accurate (if provided)
- [ ] No duplicate words or dates

### For Code Changes
- [ ] I have NOT modified `package.json` or `package-lock.json` without discussion
- [ ] I have NOT modified deployment or infrastructure files
- [ ] My code follows TypeScript best practices
- [ ] I have tested on multiple screen sizes (if UI changes)

---
